translations: 糖蛾；[植保] 切根虫；夜蛾科

sentences.sentence: Morphology of antennal sensilla of male black cutworm moth is observed with scanning electron microscope.
sentences.translation: 利用扫描电镜观察了小地老虎雄蛾触角感受器的种类、形态和分布。

sentences.sentence: Both Oxyopes sertatus and Harpactor fuscipes are important predators of common cutworm (Spodoptera litura) on tobacco.
sentences.translation: 斜纹猫蛛和红彩真猎蝽均是烟草上斜纹夜蛾的重要捕食性天敌。
